text:
[Verse]
Starlight on the skies so blue
Dreams come alive in view
Dancing in the twilight glow
Feel the magic start to grow

[Verse 2]
Whispers through the night so clear
Echoes of a world so near
Moonlight shadows play their part
Sparkles in your open heart

[Chorus]
Love and wonder everywhere
Feel the magic in the air
Moments bright and pure and rare
Feel the magic in the air

[Verse 3]
Lost in rhythms we create
Hearts that beat at the same rate
Every step a chance to see
Endless possibilities

[Bridge]
Stars above and stars below
In this dance we'll never slow
Hands are reaching out to hold
In this magic we are bold

[Chorus]
Love and wonder everywhere
Feel the magic in the air
Moments bright and pure and rare
Feel the magic in the air
title: Magic In The Air
